data.name: PageTitle
data.value: Lex ITBeard website

data.name: About
data.value: Hey!

data.name: About_Paragraph_1
data.value: My name is Lex Kartynnik , I am from Belarus, now I live in Poland and have been working in Tech since 2011.

data.name: About_Paragraph_2
data.value: I worked as a Software Engineer for the 10 years (backend, C#, .NET, Azure), and since 2021, I've been developing global tech community at aw.club. Some people call it «Developer Relations».

data.name: About_Paragraph_3
data.value: In parallel with my main job, I do a lot of tech, near-scientific and other technical content on YouTube under the pseudonym Lex ITBeard .

data.name: About_Paragraph_4
data.value: On this web site you gonna to learn a little bit more about all my projects 😊

data.name: Projects_Aia
data.value: AIA Podcasts

data.name: Projects_Itbeard
data.value: АйТиБорода

data.name: Projects_BeardNews
data.value: Beard News

data.name: Projects_BelarusAi
data.value: Belarus AI

data.name: Projects
data.value: My Projects

data.name: Projects_BelarusAi_Description
data.value:
«Belarus AI» is a Belarusian-language community of professionals and amateurs of artificial intelligence 😊

Conversations about AI, DS, ML, DL, GPT, NLP, OCR, CV, etc.

data.name: Projects_Itbeard_Description
data.value:
The show «АйТиБорода» ("ITBeard") tells about the life of tech specialists from inside and in its episodes tells about programming languages, popular technologies, professions, famous representatives of the sphere and even science.

Without any censorship, labels or extra pathos.

data.name: Projects_BeardNews_Description
data.value:
«Beard News» is a solocast where I talk about IT gossip, events in my life, new and old content, and upcoming plans.

The podcast is released once a month and is available to my patrons and sponsors.

data.name: Projects_CiomnyLos
data.value: Цёмны Лёс

data.name: Projects_Vkl
data.value: VKL.world

data.name: Projects_Vkl_Description
data.value:
«VKL.world» is the first exclusively Belarusian-language community on the Mastadon network.

Mastadon is the distributed equivalent of Twitter, but without the dictatorship of Ilon Musk.

data.name: Projects_CiomnyLos_Description
data.value:
«Цёмны Лёс» ("ciomny los") is a science-geek podcast in the Belarusian language.

From scientists to Tolkien and Warhammer lovers!

data.name: Projects_Aia_Description
data.value:
«AIA» is a podcast where we discuss with Vitya Shelenchenko the latest news from the world of neural networks and artificial intelligence.

The podcast is released with the support of Anywhere Club every two weeks.

data.name: Projects_EvoCode
data.value: Code Evolution 🧬

data.name: Projects_EvoCode_Description
data.value:
«Code Evolution» is a private Telegram club for developers who enhance their skills through learning AI tools and practices.

A unified space for diving into development paired with AI.
